'''ek-''' 1. "be open" 2. "can" (+ dative)<ref name="VT">{{VT|49}}, p.34</ref>
==Etymology==
Obviously [[Sundocarmë|Root]] *EK
==Other forms==
*''eke'' "is open" (present tense)
==Examples==
*'''''eke''' [[nin]] [[car|kar]]e [[sa]]''<ref name="VT"/> lit. "It is open to me to do that"
